data.title: USA National Football Team News, Fixtures and Results - Page 5
data.meta_description: Get the latest USA national football team news, updates, fixtures and results here.
data.text:
Furious US soccer fans SLAM Olympic team after 'embarrassing' and 'pathetic' defeat to Morocco

Despite reaching the quarterfinals for the first time since Sydney 2000, the US ended its hopes of a medal after goals from Soufiane Rahimi, Ilias Akhomach, Achraf Hakimi and Mehdi Maouhoub.

Ex-USWNT coach Jill Ellis SUES former San Diego Wave staffer for defamation over shock claim she fostered 'abusive environment' with NWSL team

Brittany Alvarado, who worked as a videographer for the Wave, made the bombshell claims against Ellis while announcing her resignation on social media earlier this month.

Christian Pulisic's 'fantastic' debut season at AC Milan is hailed by club legend Franco Baresi, who says team is 'lucky' to have two Americans

AC Milan legend Franco Baresi has praised Christian Pulisic's 'fantastic' first season at the club after the winger joined from Chelsea.

Arsenal take bolstered squad for their pre-season tour of the United States... but Declan Rice, Bukayo Saka, Aaron Ramsdale and David Raya will not join the Gunners after the Euro 2024 final

Arsenal will be sending a bolstered squad for their US pre-season tour - but without their England stars.

Mauricio Pochettino 'among the contenders for the USA job' after Jurgen Klopp turned it down

The US men's national team are still on the hunt for their next head coach after the firing of Gregg Berhalter, who was dismissed on the back of their dismal Copa America campaign this summer.

Spain manager Luis de la Fuente 'contacted US Soccer about vacant men's job two days before Euros win over England'

Luis de la Fuente just led Spain to glory on Sunday but is reportedly interested in the vacant US men's national team job. De la Fuente, 63, shepherded Spain to a 2-1 win over England.

Gregg Berhalter is FIRED as USA manager after embarrassing Copa America exit - sparking rebuild ahead of 2026 World Cup on home soil

Gregg Berhalter has been fired as manager of the United States Men's National Team, just days after his team were dumped out of Copa America in the group stages.

Christian Pulisic message to USMNT fans after Copa America exit ramps up speculation about Gregg Berhalter's future: 'Does that mean he's gone?'

Berhalter's USA crashed and burned at this summer's home Copa America after failing to make it out of the group stages following defeats to Uruguay and Panama.

USMNT legends turn on EACH OTHER over Copa America humiliation: 'Why do you think your opinion matters?'

Neither of the two former US players restrained themselves in their criticism of one another on social media just two days after the USA crashed out of Copa America with a 1-0 defeat to Uruguay.

USMNT goalkeeper Matt Turner breaks his silence on 'shameful' Copa America disaster: 'We need to hold ourselves accountable'

Matt Turner has spoken in-depth following the USMNT's disastrous group stage exit in the Copa America, with the goalkeeper calling on the team to 'hold ourselves accountable.'

Fox Sports' FURY at Copa America revealed as broadcaster is forced to defend 'unwatchable' coverage amid fan backlash

The game, which was played in Kansas City, was vital for the US' chances of progression in the tournament. Considering the match's high stakes, a widespread audience was expected for the contest.

USMNT's six days of disaster at the Copa America shows Gregg Berhalter MUST be replaced... a fresh vision is needed to avoid another humiliation at the 2026 World Cup

OLIVER SALT IN KANSAS CITY: The question marks already lingering over Gregg Berhalter and his so-called Golden Generation have now turned to exclamation points.

Gregg Berhalter gives blunt answer about his USMNT future amid calls for coach to be fired after disastrous Copa America group-stage exit

OLIVER SALT IN KANSAS CITY: A miserable 1-0 defeat to Uruguay proved the final nail in the coffin for Berhalter's men at Arrowhead Stadium on Monday night.

USA dumped out of Copa America! Woeful 1-0 defeat to Uruguay seals group-stage exit and ramps up calls for Gregg Berhalter to be FIRED

OLIVER SALT IN KANSAS CITY: What should have been the perfect springboard to catapult into a World Cup on home soil in two years' time full of belief, has instead ended in disaster for USA.

Christian Pulisic issues rallying cry ahead of the US' crucial Copa America clash: 'Game of our lives'

'We have to go and represent our country with passion and pride,' Pulisic, 25, told reporters ahead of the USA's decisive last group stage game against Uruguay on Monday, June 24th, in Kansas City.

USMNT legend DEFENDS controversial Christian soccer star Korbin Albert after LGBTQ+ activists' meltdown over her Olympics selection

Albert, 20, has been controversially selected to represent USA at this summer's Games in Paris despite sharing a number of anti-LGBTQ+ posts on social media.

US Soccer slams racist online abuse directed at Tim Weah, Folarin Balogun and others after upset Copa America loss to Panama: 'No place in the game for such hate'

Weah, who is Black, was sent off with a red card in the 18th minute after punching a Panama player. It was earliest red card for a US player since Jimmy Conrad was tossed from a 2010 friendly.

USWNT star and Olympic Gold medalist Sydney Leroux reveals bizarre parenting hack she swears by

Former US women's national team star Sydney Leroux has a special 'hack' that she uses as a mother to make her mornings with her children easier.

Wayne Rooney and Jurgen Klopp had one - but did Becks? After ex-USA star Landon Donovan admits his patchy hair at EURO 2024 was the result of a transplant, Mail Sport looks at 10 of football's best

Landon Donovan sported a bizarre and disjointed hairstyle as a result of the procedure on punditry duty at the European Championship - but where does it rank among football's best?

Christian Pulisic features on 'girlfriend' Alexa Melton's TikTok as USMNT star hits the golf course with rumored lover ahead of Copa America opener

The 25-year-old, AC Milan forward increased rumors that he's dating the 23-year-old internet personality, who's also on the LPGA's Epson Tour, by appearing on a TikTok video before facing Bolivia.

Vinicius vying for the Ballon d'Or, USMNT on home soil... and Messi's potential farewell! Five reasons why you can't miss Copa America as tournament prepares for liftoff

In just a few days' time Argentina and Chile will kick off one of the biggest soccer festivals of the summer when they collide at the Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, Georgia.

Emma Hayes and the USWNT could be the 'perfect marriage,' says World Cup winner Heather O'Reilly, as American women eye Olympic gold this summer

Emma Hayes and the US women's national team could be a 'perfect marriage,' USWNT World Cup winner Heather O'Reilly said.

USMNT hopeful John Tolkin on his point to prove in Paris ahead of 2026 World Cup, the Americans' return to the Olympic stage... and why Louis Vuitton plays a role in his success

INTERVIEW: There is little wiggle room for John Tolkin to be a major player in American soccer over the next two years, especially as someone whose first cap with the team came last year.

Arsenal, Aston Villa and West Ham are keeping tabs on USA starlet Rokas Pukstas, who is impressing in midfield at Croatian side Hajduk Split

SIMON JONES: He moved to Hajduk Split in 2020 and has become a first team regular being an integral part of the side that won the Croatia Cup last year.

Emma Hayes takes first USWNT training session as ex-Chelsea boss begins preparations for Paris Olympics

Emma Hayes took her first training session with the US women's national team on Tuesday as the Americans begin their preparations for the Olympics.

Marco Reus 'considers bombshell MLS move' after Champions League final next month as St. Louis 'holds preliminary talks' with Borussia Dortmund legend

According to The Athletic, the 34-year-old has a wide array of options on the table as he looks set to conclude his career abroad. He's been playing for Borussia Dortmund since 2013.

Sue Bird joins Seattle Storm ownership group after starring for WNBA team for nearly two decades: Megan Rapinoe's partner says investment in women's sports is just 'smart business'

Storm owners, Force 10 Hoops, said that the 43-year-old, 13-time All-Star joined the ownership group despite no financial details about the transaction being provided.

Zach and Julie Ertz announce the former USWNT star is expecting baby No. 2 this summer... just a month after the NFL star joined the Washington Commanders

'Happy Birthday Mama! We love you! Adding to the family Summer 2024!' Zach wrote as a caption to an Instagram post shared over the weekend, as Julie showed off her belly in a pic' taken on a beach.

Korbin Albert is BOOED as she comes off the bench in 2-1 win over Japan after backlash to anti-LGBTQ+ social media posts as USWNT overcomes early goal to advance to SheBelieves Cup final in front of record 50,644 fans

Korbin Albert was booed by USWNT fans on Saturday as she was introduced in the second half of the team's SheBelieves Cup semifinal vs. Japan.

Gregg Berhalter 'is NOT the coach to lead USMNT to 2026 World Cup,' slams Herculez Gomez after lucky Nations League escape against Jamaica

The last-gasp win saw the Americans sneak through to the Nations League final against Mexico with the chance to win a third straight title this weekend. But even that can't save Berhlater, believes Gomez.

Tyler Adams felt like life had 'fallen off a cliff' after a year out of soccer due to hamstring surgery - and reveals he sustained one injury backheeling a ball - as the USA captain gets set to return for his country tonight vs Jamaica

US men's national team captain Tyler Adams has revealed life had 'fall[en] off a cliff' amid his injury-plagued year that saw him sidelined with hamstring issues.

TIM HOWARD meets MATT TURNER: Legendary US goalkeeper and the current USMNT No 1 discuss World Cup dreams, the genius of Mikel Arteta... and why they both nearly turned their back on America!

Ahead of the United States' Nations League game against Jamaica, TIM HOWARD speaks to current USMNT No 1 MATT TURNER about his journey, and a huge few years for soccer in the US.

Jesse Marsch questions Tyler Adams' inclusion in USMNT squad, saying there's 'a lot more to lose than gain' by selecting midfielder who's been largely sidelined by injuries in last year

Jesse Marsch has questioned the inclusion of Tyler Adams in the latest USMNT squad following an injury-riddled year for the midfielder in which he hardly played.

Weston McKennie had his locker and PARKING SPOT removed by Juventus, USMNT boss Gregg Berhalter reveals, before midfielder worked his way back into Italian club's plans

With Weston McKennie apparently out of Juventus' plans last summer, the club removed his locker and even his parking spot, USMNT coach Gregg Berhalter revealed on Wednesday.

Tyler Adams and Gio Reyna are IN USA squad for Nations League games as USMNT captain nears return from hamstring surgery, while the Forest attacker struggles for game time in Premier League

Tyler Adams and Gio Reyna have both been included in the latest USA men's squad for the CONCACAF Nations League despite a severe lack of playing time at the club level.

USA beats Brazil 1-0 to win inaugural CONCACAF W Gold Cup... as Lindsey Horan scores the only goal in front of a packed stadium in San Diego

The Star and Stripes held their ground on home turf, with Lindsey scoring a header in first-half stoppage time, despite Brazil having more shots on goal than their opponents.

Gregg Berhalter remains confident in Gio Reyna despite US prospect's paltry playing time at Nottingham as USMNT coach continues to repair relationship with ex-teammate Claudio's son

USMNT head coach Gregg Berhalter discussed attacker Gio Reyna's lack of minutes on loan with Nottingham Forest ahead of the upcoming CONCACAF Nations League semifinals

Emma Hayes to make her United States coaching debut during a pair of friendlies against South Korea in June

Emma Hayes is set to make her debut as head coach of the United States women's team in June during a pair of friendlies against South Korea.

Christian Pulisic receives death threats from rival fans after AC Milan's heated win over Lazio that saw the American involved in two of his opponent's three red cards

Following the game, Pulisic posted photos on Instagram of himself and the AC Milan team celebrating, which became inundated with the unsavory posts in the comment section.

USA captain Tyler Adams returns to Bournemouth training as he looks to make his first appearance of 2024... with the midfielder giving Americans welcome boost for Copa America

Tyler Adams has returned to training for Bournemouth as he recovers from a hamstring injury - giving a boost to the US men's national team ahead of the Copa America.

Weston McKennie suffers dislocated shoulder after picking up two assists in Juventus' win: USMNT star's resurgent season comes to a halt following his disastrous stint at Leeds

The 25-year-old, American midfielder provided the final pass to two of Dusan Vlahovic's goals against Frosinone on Sunday, as Juventus got back to winning ways for the first time in four matches.

USWNT 4-0 Argentina: Jaedyn Shaw scores a brace inside 17 minutes as Alex Morgan and Lindsey Horan also find the back of the net as the Americans continue dominant start to CONCACAF W Gold Cup

Jaedyn Shaw scored a pair of goals and the United States went up 3-0 within the first 20 minutes before going on to defeat Argentina 4-0 on Friday night in the CONCACAF Women's Gold Cup.

REVEALED: USMNT coach Gregg Berhalter earned almost $2.3MILLION in 2022 - including $900,000 in bonuses - after leading his team to the last-16 of the World Cup in Qatar

U.S. men's coach Gregg Berhalter earned $2,291,136 in 2022, including $900,000 in bonuses for the Americans' qualifying for the World Cup and reaching the second round

USWNT 5-0 Dominican Republic: Americans make perfect start to CONCACAF W Gold Cup as Alex Morgan comes off the bench to score penalty after last-minute call up

Olivia Moultrie scored twice in her first national team start as the United States beat the Dominican Republic 5-0 on Tuesday night in the inaugural CONCACAF Women's Gold Cup tournament.

Megan Rapinoe says those who cheered her career-ending Achilles tear occupy a 'special place in hell,' and adds that Christians 'missed the whole joke' when she said injury was proof there isn't a God

Megan Rapinoe has said that those who celebrated her career-ending Achilles injury occupy a 'special place in hell.'

Gregg Berhalter has 'extra motivation' to reach 2026 World Cup final with USMNT as the showpiece is being held 15 minutes from where he grew up in New Jersey: 'It would really be a dream come true'

USMNT coach Gregg Berhalter has found extra motivation to guide his team to the 2026 World Cup final, after finding out the game will be played in his own backyard.

Yunus Musah on the 'big' call from Gregg Berhalter that lured him to the USMNT, leaving Arsenal for Valencia at 16... and why AC Milan players are making a stand after Mike Maignan's racism ordeal: 'If something like this happens again, we're not playing'

EXCLUSIVE INTERVIEW BY OLIVER SALT: By walking off the field in solidarity with their colleague, Milan stars sent a powerful message when Maignan fell victim to abuse from the stands.

Leagues Cup announces new format after Lionel Messi led Inter Miami to glory in inaugural MLS vs. Liga MX tournament... with ex-USMNT star DaMarcus Beasley praising changes

Lionel Messi led Inter Miami to victory in last season's tournament, weeks after his move to the US. This year's competition takes place between July 26 to August 25.

USWNT and Angel City striker Christen Press gives update on her recovery from FOUR ACL surgeries that have sidelined her over 20 months

USWNT and Angel City striker Christen Press recently gave an update on the status of her long-winded injury battle. Press has been sidelined since June of 2022 when she suffered a torn ACL.

Gio Reyna 'eyes Dortmund departure after appearing in just 12 of 27 games as Aston Villa considers making a run at the US winger for $16million-$22m'

The 21-year-old, Tyne-and-Wear-born American was once considered as one of the hottest up-and-coming prospect in soccer, but has not managed to assist or score in 12 games played this season.

USA suffers 1-0 defeat in friendly against Slovenia as winless streak against European opposition stretches to six games

The United States national team suffered a 1-0 loss in their friendly against Slovenia on Saturday afternoon. Nejc Gradisar scored in the only goal of the game in the 26 minute of his international debut

Lionel Messi's impact on MLS is 'fantastic' says USMNT star Christian Pulisic who 'absolutely' wants to return to America later in his career, but only after many 'great years' in Europe first

When asked about Messi's impact in the U.S., Pulisic showed his admiration for it all, as he told The Athletic: 'I can't say it's not expected. He (Messi) is, of course, the best to really ever do it.'

WNBA legend Sue Bird shuts down speculation she and Megan Rapinoe tied the knot: 'Sorry for the confusion. I guess the fits were too good'

Sue Bird has shut down speculation that she and fiancée Megan Rapinoe had gotten married, joking that they were dressed too well to a recent wedding of their friends.

Sam Kerr hilariously rips USWNT fiancée Kristie Mewis over conceding goals in Netflix docuseries as the soccer power couple open up on the competitive side of their relationship at the World Cup

Mewis, a member of the USWNT who crashed out of World Cup in the last 16, featured in Netflix 's docuseries 'Under Pressure' which follows the USA's journey throughout the tournament.

Megan Rapinoe admits her final World Cup before retirement is 'very special' ahead of USWNT's shock exit and THAT missed penalty as former teammates pay tribute to the retired star in Netflix's 'Under Pressure'

Rapinoe, 38, revealed ahead of the tournament that she would retire following the World Cup and the NWSL season and she opened up on the significance of her final World Cup in the series.

Megan Rapinoe takes a swipe at the media ahead of the USWNT's disappointing World Cup in Netflix's 'Under Pressure': 'They just want to drum s*** up'

With the tournament looming Down Under, the USA are shown gearing up for their media day with veteran Rapinoe asked to give her advice to the younger and newer members of the team.

Netflix's 'Under Pressure' doc on the USWNT was supposed to tell the story of a quest for the World Cup three-peat but instead depicts the collapse of a giant... and leaves more questions than answers over the USA's future

'Under Pressure' was supposed to be the tale of World Cup three-peat champions, instead Netflix had the chance to tell a different - and arguably bigger - story: The collapse of a giant.

United States and Mexico submit joint bid to host 2027 Women's World Cup in a move that could see North America stage soccer's two global showcases in back-to-back years

The USA and Mexico submitted a joint bid on Friday to co-host the 2027 women's World Cup that, if successful, would see the neighbors stage global soccer's two showcase events back to back.

USMNT's Copa America group is favorable with Bolivia and Panama... but the finale against Uruguay serves to remind Gregg Berhalter and Co that an early exit WILL be seen as failure: DailyMail.com analyses the draw

For the United States, an exit before the knockout stage would not only serve as a colossal failure - it may lead to the premature end of Gregg Berhalter's second tenure in charge of the team.

Gio Reyna MUST leave Borussia Dortmund because coach Edin Terzic 'doesn't trust him', CBS' Charlie Davies claims with USMNT star stuck on the bench in Germany

Gio Reyna was left out of Borussia Dortmund's squad altogether on Wednesday, and ex-USMNT forward Charlie Davies thinks the 21-year-old needs to leave the club.

USA 'set to poach Valencia winger Declan Frith away from England'... former Chelsea and Aston Villa youngster could follow in footsteps of Yunus Musah and Folarin Balogun

Frith joined Valencia this summer and registered two goals and an assist in his first two youth matches. He has also made four appearances Valencia B in the third division.

USA 'is in advanced talks to play Brazil in a friendly in Orlando' a couple of weeks before the Copa America next year as the Stars and Stripes prepare to host the tournament

The USA will host the Copa America from June 19 to July 14 and will be getting some of the best preparation possible for South America's championship in facing nine-time champion Brazil.

USMNT star Weston McKennie admits to having 'let people down' during his failed loan spell at Leeds but insists the experience is helping him flourish at Juventus

McKennie is racing to be fit for Juventus' crucial Serie A match against rivals, Inter Milan, after having appeared in all of the BIanconeri's games until the international break.

USMNT captain and Bournemouth midfielder Tyler Adams announces he and longtime girlfriend Sarah Schmidt are expecting a baby boy

Adams, 24, and Schmidt collaboratively posted a photo on their Instagram accounts on Tuesday to share the news. 'Baby boy coming in January, beyond grateful,' the pair captioned.

USMNT are beaten 2-1 by Trinidad and Tobago but survive upset to qualify for 2024 Copa America, despite being reduced to ten men after Sergino Dest's brainless red card

The Americans qualified for next year's Copa América despite a 2-1 loss to Trinidad and Tobago on Monday night in Port-of-Spain, winning 4-2 on aggregate, despite being reduced to ten men.

Emma Hayes reveals she spoke to a legendary Premier League boss after being confirmed as new USA manager... and she had to keep Mauricio Pochettino waiting to talk to him!

Emma Hayes will finish the 2023-24 Women's Super League campaign with the Blues before she joins the USA women's squad two months before the Olympics in Paris next year.

Emma Hayes admits she hasn't given USWNT appointment 'much thought' with focus still on Chelsea ahead of top-five matchup against Liverpool

Hayes was confirmed as USWNT's next head coach earlier this month, meaning she will wave goodbye to Chelsea at the end of the season following a 11-year stint with the club.

Emma Hayes confirms she will help choose the next Chelsea boss after leaving the Blues 'at the top'... but insists her exit is 'only the beginning' for the WSL champions

KATHRYN BATTE: The 47-year-old has won 15 trophies, including the last four Women's Super League titles, but is confident the club will 'continue to thrive' in her absence.

EXCLUSIVE: Emma Hayes decided to leave Chelsea to take up USA role after Blues dithered over new contract, with owners now demanding answers from sporting director Paul Winstanley

EXCLUSIVE BY MATT HUGHES: Hayes is understood to have indicated a desire to stay at Chelsea for the rest of her career during initial talks with the club, but talks were placed on hold.

Landon Donovan opens up on his FURY at Jurgen Klinsmann after being snubbed for 2014 World Cup - and says he told the USA coach he 'picked guys who don't give a f*** about US soccer'

The former L.A. Galaxy striker holds the world record for the most international assists (58) and is tied with Clint Dempsey for the most international goals scored by an American (57).

Meet the USWNT's new head coach: Emma Hayes is a trailblazer who turned Chelsea into a trophy-winning machine

KATHRYN BATTE: There is hype around Hayes because of how successful she has been - a tally of 15 trophies since 2012 has drawn comparisons with serial winner Pep Guardiola.

EXCLUSIVE: Governor Phil Murphy says New York/New Jersey region has the 'right values' for World Cup Final as it rivals Dallas bid, with politician expecting decision 'sooner than later'

New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy says the New York/New Jersey region has the 'right values' to host the 2026 World Cup final - in an apparent shot to bid rivals Dallas.

USMNT head coach Gregg Berhalter visits American stars Tim Weah and Weston McKennie at Juventus' training ground after attending 1-0 win over rivals AC Milan

Berhalter, 55, described Juve's clash against Milan as a 'turning point in U.S. soccer history' after four Americans started in last weekend's game. Tim Weah provided the clash's only assist.

USMNT legend Michael Bradley is given a guard of honor ahead of the final game of his career after Toronto FC legend announced his retirement

MLS's decision day marked Bradley's final game of his career before hanging up his boots and Toronto FC, the cub where he spent the latter half of his career, paid tribute to its captain.

Michael Bradley, USMNT legend, will retire at the end of the MLS season after an illustrious 20-year career with his final game this Saturday

Michael Bradley has called time on an illustrious career that saw him captain the USA national team, play in several countries across Europe and participate in two World Cups.

Alexi Lalas thinks there will 'ALWAYS be baggage' between Gregg Berhalter and Gio Reyna, but commends USA coach for 'believing' in midfielder and starting him against Germany

Alexi Lalas has claimed there will 'always be baggage' between Gregg Berhalter and Gio Reyna, but praised the US men's national team coach for starting the 20-year-old vs. Germany.
